an4.233:1.1: “Cattarimani, bhikkhave, kammani maya sayam abhinna sacchikatva paveditani.
an4.233:1.6: atthi, bhikkhave, kammam akanhaasukkam akanhaasukkavipakam kammakkhayaya samvattati.
an4.233:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sabyabajjham kayasankharam abhisankharoti, sabyabajjham vacisankharam abhisankharoti, sabyabajjham manosankharam abhisankharoti.
an4.233:2.3: So sabyabajjham kayasankharam abhisankharitva, sabyabajjham vacisankharam abhisankharitva, sabyabajjham manosankharam abhisankharitva sabyabajjham lokam upapajjati.
an4.233:2.4: Tamenam sabyabajjham lokam upapannam samanam sabyabajjha phassa phusanti.
an4.233:2.5: So sabyabajjhehi phassehi phuttho samano sabyabajjham vedanam vediyati ekantadukkham, seyyathapi satta nerayika.
an4.233:2.6: Idam vuccati, bhikkhave, kammam kanham kanhavipakam.
an4.233:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco abyabajjham kayasankharam abhisankharoti, abyabajjham vacisankharam abhisankharoti, abyabajjham manosankharam abhisankharoti.
an4.233:3.3: So abyabajjham kayasankharam abhisankharitva, abyabajjham vacisankharam abhisankharitva, abyabajjham manosankharam abhisankharitva abyabajjham lokam upapajjati.
an4.233:3.4: Tamenam abyabajjham lokam upapannam samanam abyabajjha phassa phusanti.
an4.233:3.5: So abyabajjhehi phassehi phuttho samano abyabajjham vedanam vediyati ekantasukham, seyyathapi deva subhakinha.
an4.233:3.6: Idam vuccati, bhikkhave, kammam sukkam sukkavipakam.
an4.233:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi kayasankharam abhisankharoti, sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi vacisankharam abhisankharoti, sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi manosankharam abhisankharoti.
an4.233:4.3: So sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi kayasankharam abhisankharitva, sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi vacisankharam abhisankharitva, sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi manosankharam abhisankharitva sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi lokam upapajjati.
an4.233:4.4: Tamenam sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi lokam upapannam samanam sabyabajjhapi abyabajjhapi phassa phusanti.
an4.233:4.5: So sabyabajjhehipi abyabajjhehipi phassehi phuttho samano sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi vedanam vediyati vokinnasukhadukkham, seyyathapi manussa ekacce ca deva ekacce ca vinipatika.
an4.233:4.6: Idam vuccati, bhikkhave, kammam kanhasukkam kanhasukkavipakam.
an4.233:5.1: Katamanca, bhikkhave, kammam akanhaasukkam akanhaasukkavipakam kammakkhayaya samvattati?
an4.233:5.2: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidam kammam kanham kanhavipakam tassa pahanaya ya cetana, yamidam kammam sukkam sukkavipakam tassa pahanaya ya cetana, yamidam kammam kanhasukkam kanhasukkavipakam tassa pahanaya ya cetana—
an4.233:5.3: idam vuccati, bhikkhave, kammam akanhaasukkam akanhaasukkavipakam kammakkhayaya samvattati.
an4.233:5.4: Imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari kammani maya sayam abhinna sacchikatva paveditani”ti.
